org.xlattice.projmgr

Class CmdFiles

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xlattice.projmgr.CmdFiles

  • public class CmdFiles
extends java.lang.Object
    Generates classpath.{bat,sh} and build.{bat,sh} for project components. The first sets up the Java classpath, the second runs Ant. XXX The Windows code has not been implemented.
    Author:
    Jim Dixon

      Write the build.{bat,sh} command file which runs Ant after calling classpath.{bat,sh} to set up the classpath.

      Write the classpath.{bat,sh} command file which sets up the classpath for Java.

      • writeClasspathCmd

        public void writeClasspathCmd(java.io.Writer writer,
                     boolean forWindows)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Write the classpath.{bat,sh} command file which sets up the classpath for Java. XXX The result will not generally be executable. Needs a chmod u+x or equivalent.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        Write the build.{bat,sh} command file which runs Ant after calling classpath.{bat,sh} to set up the classpath. XXX The result will not generally be executable. Needs a chmod u+x or equivalent.
